Name: New Install
Description: New install
StepDescription: Install from App Store or Testflight

StepExpectedResult: App should start with "Getting Started" guide
Check text and accuracy of guide
Should match App Store or testflight version

Name: Hardware install
Description: iPad only
StepDescription: Try to install app on an iPhone
Try to install app on iPad

Name: Invalid Sign In Test
Description: Try invalid settings to Sign In

StepDescription: Enter in invalid username and password
Max out the username and password field
StepExpectedResult: Nothing strange should happen and should not be logged in.
Should open lds.org page with the forgot page

Name: Sign In and switch users
Description: Sign in create some content then sign in with a different user and create different content then switch users
StepDescription: Settings > Sign In > login with a valid user (A)
Add Presentation - enter a valid name
Add slides - video, music and image

StepExpectedResult: Should be logged out and Presentations should be cleared

StepDescription: Setting > Sign In > login with a different vaild user (B)
Add Presentation - enter a valid name
Add slides - video, music and image

StepExpectedResult: Should be logged out and Presentations should be cleared
User A presentations should be displayed
User B presentations should be displayed

Name: Sync Now test
Description: Test the function of the Sync Now button
StepDescription: Settings > Sign In > enter in a valid username and password

StepExpectedResult: Should be synced *Not sure how to verify this*

Name: Enable Mirroring test
Description: Test the Enable Mirroring feature
StepDescription: Make sure you have a presentation created
Connect to an external device > Play a presentation
StepExpectedResult: Presentation should be played but it should mirror what is on the app

StepDescription: Connect to an external device > Play a presentation

Name: Send Feedback
Description: Test "Send Feedback" feature

StepExpectedResult: Gospel Media version, iOS version, iOS Local, Version: Catalog

Name: View Welcome Guide from Settings
Description: View the welcome guide from the settings menu

StepExpectedResult: Should go to the next page
Should go to the previous page

Name: Add Presentation - invalid name test
Description: Test creating a presentation with invalid settings
StepExpectedResult: New Presentation dialog should be displayed

StepDescription: Add a new Presentation button - do not enter a name - press done
Add Presentation with strange characters !@#$%^&*()_)+ etc...
Add Presentation - max out the name field
Add Presentation - enter a duplicate name
StepExpectedResult: Presentation should be added? *Not sure about this one*

Name: Slides - Enter notes test
Description: Create several slides with notes on the slides - then play the presentation
StepDescription: Add a Slide > Add Video > Slide notes enter text
StepExpectedResult: Slide should be added and notes should be displayed

StepDescription: Add a Slide > Add Video > Slide notes enter text > press Cancel
StepExpectedResult: Notes should not be added but video should be displayed

StepDescription: Add a Slide > Add Video > Max out slide notes
Add a Slide > Add Video > Enter notes with strange characters
Add a Slide > Add Music > Slide notes enter text
StepExpectedResult: Slide should be added and notes should be displayed

StepDescription: Add a Slide > Add Music > Slide notes enter text > press Cancel
StepExpectedResult: Notes should not be added but music should be displayed

StepDescription: Add a Slide > Add Music > Max out slide notes
Add a Slide > Add Music > Enter notes with strange characters
Add a Slide > Add Image > Slide notes enter text
StepExpectedResult: Slide should be added and notes should be displayed

StepDescription: Add a Slide > Add Image > Slide notes enter text > press Cancel
StepExpectedResult: Notes should not be added but image should be displayed

StepDescription: Add a Slide > Add Image > Max out slide notes
Add a Slide > Add Image > Enter notes with strange characters

StepExpectedResult: Notes should be on iPad but not on external source
Notes not displayed *this doesn't seem correct*

Name: Slides - search test
Description: Under add presentation, add slide search test
StepDescription: Add a new presentation > Add a new slide > Video > max out the search field
StepExpectedResult: Search shouldn't find anything - nothing strange should happen

StepDescription: Video > Search > enter strange charters !@#$%^&&**(()_ etc...
StepExpectedResult: Search shouldn't find anything - nothing strange should happen

StepDescription: Video > Search > enter text that should be found (Jonah, Nephi, Sepencer, Atonement etc...)
Add a new presentation > Add a new slide > Music > max out the search field
StepExpectedResult: Search shouldn't find anything - nothing strange should happen

StepDescription: Music > Search > enter strange charters !@#$%^&&**(()_ etc...
StepExpectedResult: Search shouldn't find anything - nothing strange should happen

StepDescription: Music > Search > enter text that should be found (Wheel, Prophet, Free etc...)
Add a new presentation > Add a new slide > Image> max out the search field
StepExpectedResult: Search shouldn't find anything - nothing strange should happen

StepDescription: Image > Search > enter strange charters !@#$%^&&**(()_ etc...
StepExpectedResult: Search shouldn't find anything - nothing strange should happen

StepDescription: Image > Search > enter text that should be found (Wheel, Mouse, Fire etc...)

Name: Slides - Filter - Change Source Test
Description: Add a new slide under filters change the source to "My media"
PreCondition:
Need to download videos, music and images to the ipad
Or use iPad camera to create video and images
StepDescription: Add a new Slide > Filters > Under Source change to "My Media"
StepExpectedResult: Source should be changed to "My Media"
Should display videos that have been downloaded
Should display music that have been downloaded
Should display images that have been downloaded

StepDescription: Add a video, music and image from My Media
Add My Media with LDS slides

Name: Slides - Filters - Media Type
Description: Under Filters change the media type
StepDescription: Add a new Slide (Video) > Filter > Media Type

StepExpectedResult: Media Type dialog should be displayed
Under Filters screen Media Type should say Music

StepDescription: Add a new Slide (Music) > Filter > Media Type

StepExpectedResult: Media Type dialog should be displayed
Under Filters screen Media Type should say Images

StepDescription: Add a new Slide (Image) > Filter > Media Type

StepExpectedResult: Video Type dialog should be displayed
Under Filters screen Media Type should say Videos

Name: Slides - Filters - Sort
Description: Test the sorting under filters
StepDescription: Create a new slide > Videos >  Filters > Click on sort
StepExpectedResult: Sort should be displayed, Title should be default
Should be sorted by Most Recent

StepDescription: Create a new slide > Music >  Filters > Click on sort
StepExpectedResult: Sort should be displayed, Relevance should be default
Should be sorted by Most Recent

StepDescription: Create a new slide > Images>  Filters > Click on sort
StepExpectedResult: Sort should be displayed, Relevance should be default
Should be sorted by Most Recent

Name: Slides - Favorite
Description: Test favorite selection on the slides
StepDescription: Create a new slide > Under Video Scroll down several times
Select the video you just added > Press Favorite

StepExpectedResult: The top video should be your favorite

StepDescription: Create a new slide > Under Music Scroll down several times
Select a song > Press the Favorite button
Create a new slide > Select Music tab
StepExpectedResult: The top song should be your favorite

StepDescription: Create a new slide > add a song that is not marked "favorite"
On the left navigation pane select the song you added > select favorite
Create a new slide > Select Music tab
StepExpectedResult: The top song should be your favorite

StepDescription: Create a new slide > Under Images Scroll down several times
Select an image > Press the Favorite button
Create a new slide > Select Image tab
StepExpectedResult: The top image should be your favorite

StepDescription: Create a new slide > add an image that is not marked "favorite"
On the left navigation pane select the image you added > select favorite
Create a new slide > Select Image tab
StepExpectedResult: The top Image should be your favorite

StepDescription: On the Presentation screen > unselect "Favorite" for video, music and image
StepExpectedResult: Verify that item is not a the top of your list
